class.name: jsk_topic_tools/LightweightThrottle
class.description: lightweight throttle nodelet. Publish ~output from ~input with the fixed rate specified by ~update_rate parameter.

class.name: jsk_topic_tools/MUX
class.description: mux nodelet. Publish ~output from the list of the topics listed on ~topics parameters. It supports all the API of topic_tools/mux, so you can use mux_select, mux_add, mux_delete, mux_list of topic_tools.
